description:
Are you recently graduated and looking for a job in IT? Maybe you want to get promoted? Career change? Not sure what to do next? Learn the skills you need to find a job in IT - the skills they don't teach you in school.

Find out more about different IT roles from a real life perspective, with examples, tips and tools you need. The course was developed in cooperation with IT Experts and Managers.

You will find interviews with successful IT specialists, who share their stories and give you a very good idea how to start or advance your career in IT. Learn from the best!

There is a section dedicated to passing IT exams. It is not an easy task, that's why I decided to include a few videos on that topic as well. Certificates are important and thanks to this course you will know what to expect and how to move on.

The section dedicated to IT interviews will give you unique tips to help you get through all stages of your dream job, including technical interviews!

You will find the course has been created in an entertaining way with nice presentations and... animations to give you the best experience possible!

Do you want to stand out from the crowd and get a good job in IT? This course is for you!
title: How to get a dream job in IT and pass exams: Boot Camp
